trans-unit.source: Authenticate your Windows Phone app with client managed authentication using Microsoft account
trans-unit.target: Authenticate your Windows Phone app with client managed authentication using Microsoft account

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: Overview

trans-unit.source: This topic shows you how to obtain an authentication token for Microsoft account using the Live SDK from a Windows Phone 8 or Windows Phone 8.1 Silverlight app.
trans-unit.target: This topic shows you how to obtain an authentication token for Microsoft account using the Live SDK from a Windows Phone 8 or Windows Phone 8.1 Silverlight app.

trans-unit.source: You then use this token to authenticate users with Azure Mobile Services.
trans-unit.target: You then use this token to authenticate users with Azure Mobile Services.

trans-unit.source: In this tutorial, you add Microsoft account authentication to an existing project using the Live SDK.
trans-unit.target: In this tutorial, you add Microsoft account authentication to an existing project using the Live SDK.

trans-unit.source: When successfully authenticated, a logged-in user is welcomed by name and the user ID value is displayed.
trans-unit.target: When successfully authenticated, a logged-in user is welcomed by name and the user ID value is displayed.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE]This tutorial demonstrates the benefits of using client-managed authentication and the Live SDK.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE]This tutorial demonstrates the benefits of using client-managed authentication and the Live SDK.

trans-unit.source: This enables you to more easily authenticate an already logged-on user with you mobile service.
trans-unit.target: This enables you to more easily authenticate an already logged-on user with you mobile service.

trans-unit.source: You can also request additional scopes to enable your app to also access resources like OneDrive.
trans-unit.target: You can also request additional scopes to enable your app to also access resources like OneDrive.

trans-unit.source: Service-managed authentication provides a more generalized experience and supports multiple authentication providers.
trans-unit.target: Service-managed authentication provides a more generalized experience and supports multiple authentication providers.

trans-unit.source: For more information about service-managed authentication, see the topic [Add authentication to your app](mobile-services-windows-phone-get-started-users.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information about service-managed authentication, see the topic [Add authentication to your app](mobile-services-windows-phone-get-started-users.md).
